com.tenkiv.tekdaqc.android.application

Class TekdaqcApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.tenkiv.tekdaqc.android.application.TekdaqcApplication

  • public class TekdaqcApplication
extends Application
    Custom application class which handles aspects of the library in an Android specific manner. This primarily consists of device discovery.
    Since:
    v1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Jared Woolston (jwoolston@tenkiv.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  TekdaqcApplication.DeviceDiscoveryReceiver
      Broadcast receiver which will be called when the locator has discovered a board(s).

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()

      • refreshDeviceList

        public final void refreshDeviceList()
        Clears the known boards list and causes a new device locator packet to be sent. This effectively means that only un-connected boards will known to this list. Boards which were previously discovered and have an active connection will need to be tracked by the user application.
